C

connect() - Method in class ArdSerial
public method connect - looks for a valid serial port with an Arduino board connected.
createButtonPanel(Scene) - Method in class ArduinoViewer
private method createButtonPannel - Returns a custom created button panel containing left and right buttons to see previous and next images.
createImageView(ReadOnlyDoubleProperty) - Method in class ArduinoViewer
Private method createImageView - A factory function returning an ImageView instance to preserve the aspect ratio and bind the instance to the width of the scene for resizing the image.
createProgressIndicator(Scene) - Method in class ArduinoViewer
private method ProgressIndicator - Create a progress indicator control to be centered.
createWorker(String) - Method in class ArduinoViewer
Returns a worker task (Task) which will off-load the image on a separate thread when finished; the current image will be displayed on the JavaFX application thread.
currentDirectory - Variable in class ArduinoViewer
private String currentDirectory - The directory where the Arduino will save its files - The defaut will be "" meaning the project directory
currentImageView - Variable in class ArduinoViewer
private ImageView currentImageView - The current image that is being displayed
currentIndex - Variable in class ArduinoViewer
private int currentIndex - The current position in the ArrayList imageFiles (The image that is currently being viewed)
